TenantSecurityGuestUserAnomaly.name: TenantSecurityGuestUserAnomaly
TenantSecurityGuestUserAnomaly.description: Represents metric details for guest user anomaly events detected by Threat Detection.

DetailIdentifier.description: The unique identifier for this detail record.

EventDate.description: The time when the anomaly was reported. For example, 2020-01-20T19:12:26.965Z. The most granular setting is milliseconds.

EventIdentifier.description: The unique ID of the event, which is shared with the corresponding storage object.

MetricIdentifier.description: The ID of the type of metric counted. This field is unique within your organization.

Name.description: The name of the metric for the data collected.

RequestedObjects.description: The objects requested by the customers.

Score.description: Specifies how significantly the guest user behavior deviates from the other guest users. It is formatted as a number between 0 and 1.

SoqlCommands.description: SOQL commands run by the guest user.

Summary.description: A text summary of the anomaly that caused this event.

Tenant.description: The ID of the tenant that was targeted in the event.

TenantName.description: The name of the tenant that was targeted in the event.

TotalControllerEvents.description: The number of times controllers were triggered.

UserType.description: Type of user of this event. For example, a guest user.

Username.description: The origin username in the format of user@company.com at the time the event was created.
